moves.6... Be7 7. dxc5: An unusual move, letting the dark-squared bishop develop easily.
moves.10. Bxh7+: (!) Wins the game in a few moves.
moves.12. Qg4: Threatening a discovery and also threatening Qh4!
moves.13. Qh4: Checkmate with Qh7 is unstoppable. Hope you enjoyed the game, and remember to look out for the Greek Gift every single move!
